items.question: How often should I have my windows professionally cleaned?
items.answer: For Wisconsin homes, we recommend professional window cleaning every 3-6 months. This ensures that your windows stay not only clean but protected year round!

items.question: What types of windows do you clean?
items.answer: We specialize in cleaning all types of windows, wood, aluminum, and vinyl framed windows. Our services are suitable for both residential and commercial properties. We also clean lead glass windows.

items.question: Do you have a satisfaction guarantee?
items.answer: Yes! We stand behind our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with our service, we'll make it right at no additional charge.

items.question: How long does a fresh coat of paint last?
items.answer: The lifespan of exterior paint typically ranges from 5-7 years in Wisconsin, however OUR paint products last 8-15 years depending on weather exposure, surface preparation, and number of coats. We use premium, weather-resistant paints and proper application techniques to maximize durability and ensure you're getting exactly what you're looking for.

items.question: What surfaces can you paint on your exterior painting service?
items.answer: We paint all wood types, aluminum, vinyl (with vinyl safe paint), and any cement based projects! This includes all parts of your home or business, shutters, facia, eaves, siding, doors, inside & outside.
